item.title: BCS
item.description: score:23 Chances: Barclays Sets Aside Balance Sheet Cash for Private Debt Push Barclays appoints two new senior leaders into its Technology Investment Banking team Barclays Hires Moelis’s Lee Counselman for Tech Investment Banking Barclays appoints James Edmonds as Global Head of Sustainable Project Finance There’s A Lot To Like About Barclays’ (LON:BARC) Upcoming UK£0.
